INVALID_FORMAT: INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid request format, you must send your request as /?rate=<number> <ETHUnit> / <timeUnit>
INVALID_RATE: INVALID_RATE: You must enter a valid number for rate
INVALID_ETHER_UNIT: INVALID_ETHER_UNIT: You must choose ether unit in [ether,milliether,microether,gwei,mwei,kwei,wei]
INVALID_TIME_UNIT: INVALID_TIME_UNIT: You must choose time unit in [day,hour,minute,second]
